# findIndicatorNeedsUpdate

**Instance Property**

Invoke to specify that the find indicator needs updating when not contained within a scroll view.

## Declaration

```swift
var findIndicatorNeedsUpdate: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFinder/client] object’s document is not scrolled by an instance of `NSScrollView`, then set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when scrolling occurs to cause the find indicator to be updated appropriately.
